潚潚潚

潚字的基本解释

潚
sù
水深而清澈。
迅疾：“迅焱潚其媵我兮。”
姓。

潚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》息逐切，入屋，心。］
(1)深清貌。
(2)迅疾貌。
(3)见“潚率”。
(4)见“潚箾”。
(5)姓。汉有潚河。见《奇姓通》。
[②]［sōu］
［《字彙補》蘇鳩切］
同“溲2”。
淘米。

潚字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潚； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第08
【唐韻】子叔切【集韻】子六切，?音蹙。【說文】深淸也。　又疾也。【張衡·思?賦】迅飇潚其媵我兮。　又【廣韻】息逐切【集韻】息六切，?音肅。義同。　又姓。【奇姓通】漢有雁門太守潚何。　又【廣韻】蘇彫切【集韻】先彫切，?音蕭。與瀟同。　又與溲同。淘米也。

潚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
潚字的起名意思

指水深而清澈，或指迅疾。

Yun
Basic explanation of words
Yun
sù
The water is deep and clear.
Quickly: "Xun Yan's sorrowful sorrowfulness."
name.
Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
["Guangyun" cuts into the house, heart. ]
(1) Deep and clear appearance.
(2) Quick appearance.
(3) See "Than Rate".
(4) See "Tun Chai".
(5) Last name. There is Tonghe in Han Dynasty. See "Qi Xing Tong".
[②] [sōu]
["Zihuibu" Su Jiuqie]
Same as "Deut 2".
Wash rice.
Yun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潚; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 649 08
[Tang Yun] Uncle Zi cut [Ji Yun] Six cuts, sound floppy. 【Said the text】Shen Cheong also.　I'm sick again. [Zhang Heng·Si? Fu] Xun Biao and I am so happy.　[Guangyun] The interest is cut by the rate [Jiyun] The interest is six cuts, and the sound is su. The same meaning.　Another last name. [Qi surname pass] Han has Yanmen prefect Yunhe.　[Guangyun] Su Diaoqie [Jiyun] Carve and cut first,? Yin Xiao. Same with Xiao.　 Same with Diane again. Wash rice too.
Yun
